story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_0400: You don’t have to say any more. I already know...
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_0700:
I know there are people with different ideals in
Team Plasma.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_0800:
I met people in Unova who really respect you
from the bottom of their hearts.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_0900: They also told me how kind you are, N.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1100:
We got here together, and I saw how you care for
your Pokémon.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1200:
The Pokémon trust you, too. Seeing that, there’s no
way you’re actually a bad guy.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1300: I know you can’t undo what you did in the past...
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1500: Hugh... Thank you for believing in me.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1600: You’re the one I can’t forgive!
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1700:
You took advantage of N’s pure feelings and put
the blame on him!
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_1800: You play dirty, and that’s what I hate the most!
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_2000: You’re about to feel my rage!
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_2200: So, you are going against me?
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_2300: How pitiful of you not to listen to the perfect ruler.
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_2500: I’m sorry... I want to battle together, but...
story_teamplasma_02_03000/2401_1001_2700: I understand. I’ll fight for you, too!
